meanings.definition: A type of worm with a segmented body.
meanings.sent1: I saw many annelids in the garden after the rain.
meanings.sent2: Scientists study annelids to learn more about their habitats.
meanings.sent3: The annelids had a party in the soil, wiggling around happily.
meanings.sent4: The annelids in the compost bin work tirelessly to break down organic matter.
meanings.sent5: The fisherman used annelids as bait to catch fish in the lake.

meanings.definition: An organism belonging to the phylum Annelida.
meanings.sent1: Annelids play a crucial role in the ecosystem.
meanings.sent2: The annelids in the aquarium were fascinating to observe.
meanings.sent3: The annelids organized a parade to celebrate their phylum.
meanings.sent4: The garden was like a bustling city for the annelids, each with its own role.
meanings.sent5: The children learned about annelids in their science class and were amazed by their diversity.
